ygData.subject: Gaussian Impulse

I am trying to create a combustor model in Matlab. But I think Cantera 
lib=
rary in Matlab does not have Gaussian Impulse for initial ignition 
of the =
mixture. Since I am not familiar with Python and it does not 
have the plot=
 capabilities of the Matlab at the first place, I tried 
to build a Gaussia=
n pulse object in Matlab. Unfortunately I have not 
been able to do this so=
 far. So I was wondering if anyone is dealing 
with similar problem and has=
 a solution to it.
Professor Goodwin:
would you tell me what is the formula=
 that you used for Gaussian 
impulse in Python?

Thanks
